columns.name: name
columns.description: The resource name.

columns.name: friendly_name
columns.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This name in mutable.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource identifier.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The current deployment state of workspace resource, The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning. Possible values include: 'Unknown', 'Updating', 'Creating', 'Deleting', 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Canceled'.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The creation time for this workspace resource.

columns.name: workspace_id
columns.description: The immutable id associated with this workspace.

columns.name: application_insights
columns.description: ARM id of the application insights associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created.

columns.name: container_registry
columns.description: ARM id of the container registry associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of this workspace.

columns.name: discovery_url
columns.description: ARM id of the container registry associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created.

columns.name: hbi_workspace
columns.description: The flag to signal HBI data in the workspace and reduce diagnostic data collected by the service.

columns.name: key_vault
columns.description: ARM id of the key vault associated with this workspace, This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

columns.name: service_provisioned_resource_group
columns.description: The name of the managed resource group created by workspace RP in customer subscription if the workspace is CMK workspace.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of the sku.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Tier of the sku like Basic or Enterprise.

columns.name: storage_account
columns.description: ARM id of the storage account associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the azure ML workspace.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: The encryption settings of Azure ML workspace.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the resource.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
